title.en: Kidou Senshi Collection Comic SECRET FORMULA

description.en:
Mobile Suit Collection Comic SECRET FORMULA is a manga written by Shingo Takeba, published by Bandai and serialized by SD CLUB between 1988 - 1991. 

C0087.11.20 – Following the Dakar declaration, there was a sudden change in the Federation on its standpoint towards the AEUG and the Titans. At the lunar surface industrial city of Epsilon, A radical group within the AEUG calling themselves the Real AEUG launch an attack on a mobile suit factory and a battle breaks out between mobile suit forces of the AEUG. The Real AEUG is a group that has alienated itself from the main forces, thus rejecting the speech Char Aznable made as leader of the AEUG.
